posts.postText:
Change the server to Ultimate Chimera Hunt or Ultimate Chimera Hunt/Deathrun.

Make it so you can see what you're doing instead of seeing a huge-ass head while being the Chimera.

Fix the vote so we don't go to TF2 maps.

Meet all of my demands and I will be a happy camper :D!
I don't understand whats wrong with your view as the chimera, I can see fine...
I see a head with two small areas to see out of, like seeing out of an eye that's blind with pinkness with only peripheral vision.
I'll post a picture tomorrow of what it looks like to me.
The server's going to be made into Fretta, which is a mixture of a bunch of games.

So we're doing all the fretta game-modes, or only a few?
Because, there is a lot of them out there.

>> The server's going to be made into Fretta, which is a mixture of a bunch of games.
